doc.summary: Gets the title of the screen.
doc.text: Gets the title of the screen.

doc.summary: Gets the message for the button that opens the screen.
doc.text: Gets the message for the button that opens the screen.

parameters.name: inputChanged
parameters.doc: A consumer that should be called with the new value whenever the input changes.

parameters.name: screen
parameters.doc:
The screen that is used. This can be used to get the available width. Height is unlimited
because the screen is scrollable. Also, this must be used if the screen wants
to draw tooltips, or they won't work correctly.

parameters.name: manager
parameters.doc:
A ScreenManager that provides access to the internal screen history and can be
used to rebuild the screen.

parameters.name: search
parameters.doc: The current search term or an empty <ref cls="java/lang/String">String</ref> if there is none.

parameters.name: consumer
parameters.doc: A consumer that will consume all widgets that should be displayed.

doc.summary: Interface that defines content for custom config editor screens.
doc.text: Interface that defines content for custom config editor screens.
